Text:
This morning, I was joined by incredible local Black leaders from the MLK Jr. Coordinating Committee, the @SpadyMuseum, @EmpowHER_PBC, & our #PBC schools to discuss #BlackHistoryMonth & the importance of teaching Black History. 

Watch our conversation: https://t.co/hlGJsamsB8

I know from my own experience as a working mother—& now a working grandmother—about the importance of investing in America's care infrastructure.

No one should have to choose between food on the table or taking care of a loved one. #CareCantWait https://t.co/trJLhuy4vv

If you need assistance paying your utility bills, the Low Income Home Energy Assistance Program can help. You can apply online or attend the #PalmBeachCounty Community Services' in-person session today at the Lantana Branch Library, until 7:30 PM. https://t.co/0PVS6SB50N

In honor of #BlackHistoryMonth, @TheBlackCaucus and @JECDems released new analysis of the current economic status of Black Americans, celebrating the progress that has been made and recognizing the challenges that remain. #JECxCBC 

Learn more: https://t.co/hnjSMVDmHO

The Biden Administration is right to work in lockstep with our NATO allies to levy targeted financial sanctions against Russia and to insist that more consequences will follow if Putin does not deescalate his military aggression.
Putin trampled on that agreement in 2014 when he annexed Crimea and provoked a separatist war in Eastern Ukraine, and is now being even more brazen with his latest incursion.
In 1994, Ukraine voluntarily gave up the world’s third largest arsenal of nuclear weapons in exchange for security guarantees from the U.S., UK, and Russia.

Vladimir Putin’s hostility in Ukraine is not only a threat to the sovereignty and security of the Ukrainian people, but to all those who want to live in a world where free and democratic nations are not threatened by foreign aggression. https://t.co/Qzc1xhPSWz

Dr. Paul Farmer's death is a devastating loss. His remarkable contributions to global public health changed and saved lives around the world, and his legacy will continue through his lasting work.

My heart is with his loved ones.
https://t.co/XK2iciREKu

The @WhiteHouse heard from parents, and kids, earlier today about why we can't wait to #SolveChildCare. 

Watch here: https://t.co/wlLGFsahDx
We can't #BuildBackBetter without working parents, which is why investing in child care & early education is critical to making an economy that works for all Americans.
School should be a safe place for all our kids, regardless of their gender identity or sexual orientation, not a place students are afraid to be themselves. This harmful legislation must be stopped.

LGBTQ+ children already face discrimination & isolation in schools, & Florida's "Don't Say Gay" bill would only make things worse.

I joined @RepDWStweets’ letter urging all Florida lawmakers to oppose this hateful & regressive legislation. https://t.co/vmrmIphRif

Thank you to all caregivers in #PBC & across the country for your vital work taking care of our loved ones.

It's time we invest in the Care Economy to support our hospice workers, child care workers, family caregivers, & more. #CaregiversDay #CareCantWait

The expanded #ChildTaxCredit was a life-changing benefit for American families, & we cannot leave the families who relied on these payments behind.

We need to extend the expanded CTC. https://t.co/J3w0rWa5WU
I'm glad to hear the Senate is taking up a vote to consider the Women's Health Protection Act, to protect reproductive freedom for all people-- regardless of income or zip code.

I am deeply disappointed, but not surprised, that the Florida House passed their dangerous 15-week abortion ban.

The decision of whether and when to bring a child into this world should be in the hands of a pregnant person and people that they trust--no one else.

Thanks to the #AmericanRescuePlan, #PBC income-eligible homeowners can now apply for financial assistance to make necessary repairs to their homes. 

Learn more & apply: https://t.co/nqKvleoV7a

The @IRSnews website has launched a new page with updates & tips for this year's tax season. In less than two weeks, more than 4 million tax refunds have already gone out worth nearly $10 billon.

Make sure you're staying on top of your filings: https://t.co/SuTmij7ayp

These investments will not only protect homes & businesses in our community, they will also create good-paying union jobs as we build a more climate-resilient infrastructure & face the growing threat of climate change. 

Watch our press conference here: https://t.co/NfV9dAgEZP

Mayor Keith James, Jake Leech of the @pbcgov Office of Resilience, & #PBC Water Resources Manager Jeremy McBryan joined me today to announce new funding opportunities through the Infrastructure, Investment, & Jobs Act to bolster local flooding & disaster mitigation efforts.
🚨 #PBC veterans: check out the @WPBVAHCS's food drive-thru tomorrow. Call the numbers below to learn more & verify your eligibility. https://t.co/l6VLcfOUgQ

February is National Children’s Dental Health Month.

Regular check-ups are essential for oral health. If you need help with coverage, learn more about the Children's Health Insurance Program (CHIP) available to millions of children & teens: https://t.co/6VKdaDqa7M #NCDHM https://t.co/NELfpyOe71

The loved ones of the Sandy Hook victims achieved a historic step forward in the fight against gun violence today. This settlement cannot bring back the lives lost, but thanks to the bravery of the families, it could prevent future deaths. https://t.co/3247ZGHdvv

Thanks to the #BipartisanInfrastructureLaw, 10 million families are now enrolled in the nation’s largest ever broadband affordability program! 

See if you’re eligible: https://t.co/ky2L4JnHgi
This month @PBCSD is celebrating our school bus drivers with #LoveTheBusMonth! Thank you to all #PBC school bus drivers and attendants for taking care of our children and "driving our future".

Every nine minutes, someone is added to the national transplant waiting list. Signing up to become an organ donor takes one minute, & you could save as many as eight lives.

Do an act of love today by learning more & signing up at https://t.co/ky72p6cqfV #NationalDonorDay
#HealthPolicyValentines https://t.co/jw1Yg4d5MR

For too long our country has failed to invest in fair & affordable housing, leaving families to experience homelessness & housing instability. Let’s #ShowHousingLove & #PassBuildBackBetter to fund sustainable housing and resilient communities.
Identifying and treating potential risks early on is critical to keeping our children and families safe. #MSDStrong

It’s time to stand with the survivors of the Parkland shooting and pass commonsense gun legislation, invest in the proper mental health services, and fund the security and community resources they have been advocating for since 2018.

Today, we reflect on this tragedy and remember the victims. 

We must also recommit ourselves to working with the brave survivors who have taken their loss, trauma, and grief and turned it into activism. Students should be focused on taking notes, not taking cover, at school.

It’s been four years since 17 students and staff were murdered, and 17 more were injured, during the horrific shooting at Marjory Stoneman Douglas High School, and the grief over the lives lost and families that were broken that day is still very real. https://t.co/qUQuydB3TL

If you're a veteran in crisis or you're concerned about a veteran, there's help available: 

-Call 1-800-273-8255 & press 1
-Chat online at https://t.co/sors7VlXLF
-Text 838255

The support is free, confidential, 24/7 & you don't need to be enrolled in VA benefits or health care.

The Violence Against Women Act lapsed in 2019, leaving survivors at risk for too long.

I'm relieved that the Senate has finally introduced a bipartisan #VAWA reauthorization, and I urge them not to delay this critical bill any longer.

Heart disease is the number one cause of death for women of all ages, races, & origins in the U.S.

This #HeartMonth, be proactive about your health & learn more about what you can do to lower your risk: https://t.co/RfCnW6nabj

I'm honored to have received another 100% from the @HSLegFund for my voting record in 2021! 

Protecting animals is an important issue for so many of my #PBC neighbors & I'm proud to work with you to stand up for animal rights. #HumaneScorecard https://t.co/0CjGW7Vvi2

I marched for choice to the Florida Supreme Court in 1989, & I marched to the United States Supreme Court again in 2021.

State legislatures across the U.S. are threatening women's right to choose right now. It's time the Senate passes #WHPA. https://t.co/NfobUipBeR

Florida's future is electric.⚡ 

Thanks to the #BipartisanInfrastructureLaw, Florida communities are receiving almost $30 million in the first year alone to build EV charging infrastructure, create good-paying jobs #ElectrifyingAmerica, & reduce carbon pollution. https://t.co/9qJulggEzO
Early detection saves lives. This #CancerPreventionMonth make an appointment to talk to your doctor about which cancer screenings you need. https://t.co/s0QTpcRhUa

Schools should be a nurturing environment for kids to learn & grow, & LGBTQ+ students deserve to be supported in the classroom, just like their peers.

This “Don't Say Gay” bill will only encourage bullying & make schools more dangerous for kids that are already vulnerable. https://t.co/kEyq93BgQW

A @NIH-funded study found that having #COVID19 while pregnant increases the chances for pregnancy-related complications, including severe illness, preterm deliveries, or even death. 

Getting vaccinated is the safest, easiest, & most effective protection. https://t.co/vaxTA6hcbN

I'm proud to join @RepAndyLevin & over 100 of our colleagues to introduce a resolution recognizing Congressional staffer's right to unionize.

We must protect the right for all workers—including Congressional staff—to use their voices & engage in collective bargaining. https://t.co/2h8XP7vWSB

The 2022 tax season is happening now through April 18! Don't wait until the last minute. 

Start gathering the necessary documents now and speed up the process by filling electronically as early as possible & opting for direct deposit. 

Learn more: https://t.co/08FWRbkreu

Our fight for LGBTQI+ equality cannot stop at our borders. 

I'm proud to support H.R. 3485, the #GlobalRespectAct which sends a clear message that violence and persecution against the LGBTQI+ community around the world will not be tolerated. https://t.co/5bv1s9f48T

Grateful to have received a 100% on my voting record from @civilrightsorg—a coalition of 200+ national organizations working to protect civil & human rights in the US.

I'm proud to work to protect access to economic security, education, health care & more.https://t.co/Ic9iIY7wEJ

Despite historic gains and job growth, we need to do more to help women re-enter the workforce. It's time for the Senate to take up and pass the #BuildBackBetter Act to ensure that women & families are not left behind on the path to economic recovery. https://t.co/sPFrz3koA9

The expanded #ChildTaxCredit was life-changing for working families. It drastically cut child poverty & allowed parents right here in #PBC to go back to work.

Fighting to continue it is the right thing, and the smart thing, to do. https://t.co/gdPXRhjwQx

#SCOTUS is meant to protect & uphold our democracy, not undermine it. Reinstating Alabama's Congressional map directly suppresses the voice of Black voters.

This must be a clarion call for the Senate to pass the #ForThePeople Act & take politics out of the redistricting process.

I've been a lifelong supporter of unions and making the workplace better for all employees—and that includes Congressional staff.

Congress wouldn't be able to run without them, and they deserve the opportunity to use their voices and engage in collective bargaining.

On #SaferInternetDay, I commit to fostering a safer internet for our children—starting with joining @RepSusanWild in calling on @YouTube to remove "How To Tie a Noose" & similar videos.

This could be the difference between life & death for kids considering suicide. #TakeThemDown https://t.co/L92Z4JMa8b

Follow along LIVE as the Senate hopefully confirms Holocaust historian, Dr. @deborahlipstadt as the Special Envoy to Monitor & Combat Antisemitism. This Ambassador position is a necessary step to confront rising antisemitism. https://t.co/tqFtluZWEg

This #BlackHistoryMonth, we uplift the legacies of Black icons, innovators, and trailblazers. 

But be very clear, Black History is not limited to this month, Black History is 365 days a year. #LearnLiveMakeBlackHistory https://t.co/m3wxmBFAUS

Fine print hidden in a lengthy contract shouldn’t be what stops a survivor from telling their story.

I'm proud to cosponsor @RepCheri’s Ending Forced Arbitration Act so survivors of sexual assault & harassment aren’t blocked from seeking justice. #EndForcedArbitration https://t.co/WoKoiHaq7b

.@POTUS recently made hundreds of millions of N95 masks available to all Americans to protect against #COVID19. The masks are free at participating pharmacies & health centers, including the @healthcaredist.

Find more pick-up locations & learn more below: https://t.co/K7K5LNcyVq
Watch here: https://t.co/wuqoXc09Nq

Today Dwight Chenette, CEO of the Area Agency on Aging & Chad Hockman, Director of Operations of @Palm_Tran joined me to discuss how $2 billion in new nation-wide grant funding from the #BipartisanInfrastructureLaw can help older and disabled adults get around #PBC.

The latest numbers show that Americans who received their booster are 97% less likely to die from the virus. #COVID19 vaccines are free, safe, & effective. 

Find a vaccine or booster near you at https://t.co/BLsWeLMFzJ to protect yourself & your family. https://t.co/xScP14hc2X

.@POTUS' latest plans to reduce gun violence are steps in the right direction to making our communities safer. Now Congress must act on commonsense gun legislation. Together, we can work to #EndGunViolence. 

https://t.co/7NXwvhQFYp

#PaidLeave means not having to choose between your job & family. Passing the Family & Medical Leave Act #OTD in 1993 was a huge victory, but 29 years later the law still only extends to part of the American workforce. 

It’s time to expand the #FMLA so all workers are eligible. https://t.co/ccPkVBiv4r

In January, our economy created 467,000 jobs! 

Thanks to the #AmericanRescuePlan passed by @HouseDemocrats, & our successful vaccination program, Americans are back at work at a record-setting pace with 6.6 million jobs created in @POTUS' first year in office. #BidenBoom https://t.co/NUdoKbj34J

Building on our #BipartisanInfrastructureLaw, this investment in domestic manufacturing advances @POTUS' Make-it-in-America agenda to strengthen our supply chains, ease the burden of inflation, & super-charge American innovation to out-compete China & the rest of the world.
I was proud to vote for the America COMPETES Act today. This legislation is a big win for workers, businesses, & the American economy. https://t.co/5REDXjmpuI

#DYK that men & women can exhibit different symptoms when they're having a heart attack? And that indicators for women can include nausea, vomiting, & fatigue? 

This #HeartMonth, make sure you know the warning signs. It could save your life. https://t.co/EFixK3JlEN

Great news! Medicare beneficiaries will soon be able to get 8 free over-the-counter #COVID19 tests per month.

In the meantime, you can still order free tests straight to your home at https://t.co/wY0irwz41u or find tests locally at https://t.co/C0pHNkDOfI.

Thank you to my guests from @unitedwaypbc & @pbccsd who joined me today to announce nearly $2 million in new funding that #PBC will be receiving from @FEMA for food, shelter, rent, mortgage, & utility assistance programs.

Watch now: https://t.co/rRdiFWM6mE

American prosperity is at risk if we fall behind the rest of the world in manufacturing the technologies of the future.

#AmericaCOMPETES will ensure that America leads the world in innovation and industry in the 21st century. https://t.co/dofy28zCK5

I'm proud to support @POTUS, @FLOTUS, and @VP as they relaunch the Cancer Moonshot and encourage cancer screenings and early detection for everyone.

Working together, we can save lives and change the way we treat cancer. https://t.co/3cfkhRe1Rd
152 years later, the right to vote is under the greatest threat we've seen since Jim Crow. It's time for the Senate to protect access to the ballot box for all Americans.

#OTD in 1870, the 15th Amendment was ratified, declaring "the right of citizens of the United States to vote shall not be denied or abridged by the United States or by any State on account of race, color, or previous condition of servitude."

Thankful to the brave men & women of our military, our intelligence community, and @POTUS for the counter-terrorism operation that removed ISIS leader al-Qurayshi as a global threat. 

Our nation & our world is safer because of this mission.
https://t.co/JTYc1UVtEM

The U.S. has endless potential to compete globally in innovation & technology. 

The #AmericaCOMPETES Act provides the critical resources, funding, & tools we need to achieve that. We're investing in our nation's manufacturing & prosperity—now & for decades to come. https://t.co/mwCPkjgXTk

In @POTUS’ first year in office, GDP grew at 5.7%—the fastest rate since 1984! The U.S. is also the first major advanced economy in the world to come back above pre-pandemic levels of GDP. 

And we're not done yet. 💪

.@OversightDems is speaking with former employees of the #WashingtonCommanders about their experience with workplace misconduct & the importance of the EMPOWER Act for safe work environments. 

Watch now: https://t.co/jefMDFV5uR

“The Iranian nuclear threat is real & has grown disproportionately worse day by day. It is becoming a clear & present danger.” @SenatorMenendez is right, our goal must be the right deal, not just any deal.

A nuclear Iran is a danger to the Middle East, the U.S., & the world. https://t.co/CkTOokR8cj

And this is just the beginning. 

Democrats delivered the #BipartisanInfrastructureLaw to fund these projects & bring our infrastructure into the 21st century. https://t.co/hXppxjjS0U

✅ Safer bridges for everyone.
https://t.co/7gQwS3qLOh

✅ Investments in broadband.
https://t.co/SxykRLP0sm

✅ Billions of dollars for clean water.
https://t.co/IxJuEgvjqB

✅ Wins for our airports.
https://t.co/n9EVBrObOC
✅ New funding opportunities for Palm Tran electric buses and public transit. https://t.co/wC4HZM3Ml6

✅ We've got record funding coming to the Everglades. 
https://t.co/tnfFWzQVEt

Democrats deliver on infrastructure & jobs.

Thanks to the #BipartisanInfrastructureLaw, our airports, buses, bridges, water plants, & so much more will benefit from the funding coming to #PBC.

Check out some of the #DemocratsDeliverInfrastructure examples below:

The report's many baseless allegations are rooted in historic prejudices & false narratives, & can lead to potential tragic consequences.

Read our statement here:
https://t.co/9UB7kCCQNr

I joined my colleagues @RepDWStweets, @RepSchneider, @RepElaineLuria, @RepKManning, @RepJoshG, @RepDeanPhillips, @BradSherman, & @RepAuchincloss in releasing a joint statement rejecting Amnesty International UK’s report delegitimizing the Jewish & democratic State of Israel.
Happy #LunarNewYear to all celebrating! May this Year of the Tiger bring you strength, health, and joy. https://t.co/V4ab5lxKef

Gun violence leaves a mark on each individual & community it impacts. We must support survivors & work to end gun violence so no one else has to endure what they went through. 

This National Gun Violence Survivors Week, let’s all recommit to that goal. #GVSurvivorsWeek https://t.co/fLMV6nPDlJ

It’s beyond hypocritical for the Republican Members who voted against this bill to turn around and complain about this historic investment. 

Their lack of graciousness is an embarrassment to our state.
Each project we’re able to complete is a monumental win for the millions of Floridians, and hundreds of endangered plants and animal species that rely on this ecosystem.

This historic investment in our nation’s infrastructure includes the largest single allocation for Everglades restoration in our history. Restoring the Everglades is a deeply complex, comprehensive plan.

My Florida Republican colleagues made a choice. Instead of participating in the negotiations of this historic infrastructure law, they turned their backs on bipartisanship to try to deny @POTUS a win. 

https://t.co/DQPhqXjdxG

Happy 82nd birthday to the first social security check! 

Our grandparents not only built our families, they built our nation. I will always fight to protect social security & make sure our seniors can age with the dignity they deserve.

Today is the the anniversary of the Lilly Ledbetter Fair Pay Act! 

While we celebrate this law's big step towards equality in the workplace & #EqualPay, we also recognize there is still more work to be done. We need the #PaycheckFairness Act.

Free N95 masks are going to start being available at local pharmacies & health centers, thanks to the Biden-Harris administration. 

Protecting yourself & your loved ones against #COVID19 with masks, tests, & vaccines is the best way to slow the spread. https://t.co/EielKEZhmg

Great news is coming for our ports, harbors, & waterways: the #BipartisanInfrastructureLaw will provide $17 billion for 500 projects across the nation.

These funds will protect communities from flood damage, boost supply chain resilience, maintain natural resources, & more. https://t.co/tLAHiAIud9

14.5 million Americans enrolled for ACA coverage for 2022, the most to ever sign up during an open enrollment period! Thanks to @POTUS & the Democratic Congress, health care is now more affordable & accessible. 

Health care should be a right, not a privilege, for all Americans.

1 year ago the Biden-Harris Administration took the first step of recommitting the US to global #ReproHealth & rights by rescinding the overreaching & dangerous #GlobalGagRule.

Now it's time to make this change permanent to advance global health, human rights, & gender equality. https://t.co/y1KSgpL5oz
By making sexual harassment an offense in the Uniform Code of Military Conduct, @POTUS' executive order will improve accountability and encourage reporting, so no survivor has to suffer in silence.

Our servicemembers dedicate their lives to our country, and deserve to be treated with dignity and respect. Sexual harassment in the military harms both the survivor and our broader national security. 

https://t.co/d9HtaUcppQ

Today's conversation is part of our efforts to combatting rising antisemitism and ensuring that “never again” is more than a slogan. 

Watch it now: https://t.co/yjAlxa3hII

In recognition of this day, I held a roundtable this morning with colleagues @RepTedDeutch, @RepDWStweets, national & local leaders from the @ADL, @JewishPalmBeach, @PBCSD, and more, and our very special guest, Holocaust survivor Halina Baumgarten.

Today is International Holocaust Remembrance Day, held every year on the anniversary of the liberation of Auschwitz. 

We commemorate this day, not on a terrible anniversary of a massacre, but rather on the anniversary of liberation, to emphasize heroism in the midst of despair.

The Biden Administration is following the science of which monoclonal antibody treatments are effective and updating guidance and shipments accordingly. Misleading statements by some elected officials are for the purpose of scoring political points not saving lives.

Public health experts from the @US_FDA, @CDCgov, and other federal agencies have been working tirelessly to ensure every American who gets #COVID19 has access to the treatment they need.

https://t.co/A1yuI1VfYj

It was an honor to be at the ribbon cutting ceremony for the new FoundCare location named after my friend & retiring FoundCare CEO, Yolette Bonnet.

I also had the pleasure of presenting Yolette with her Congressional Record for her decades as a leader in community care in #PBC. https://t.co/pgxRMESZgv

Congratulations to all the #PBC school leaders who were recognized this year! 

🏆 Principal of the year @RoberaRo 
🏆 Assistant Principal of the year @SaundersJHS 
🏆 Teacher of the year @Annabellaw65 
🏆 School-Related Employee of the year Connie Leonardi https://t.co/n9roZr3GrY

To compete globally—including with China—we must level the playing field for our workers & companies.

The bipartisan #COMPETESAct secures critical supply chains, elevates our economic diplomacy, & invests in technologies critical to our prosperity & security for decades to come. https://t.co/FEoGJjeAWx

School is stressful enough without the threat of violence. Our kids deserve the best opportunity to thrive without having to fear for their lives.

Watch my press conference with #PBC School District leaders @alexandriayala & @561Sdpbc: https://t.co/iiTicZq6M6
Today I was proud to announce that @PBCSD will receive a $1 million grant from the @TheJusticeDept to support evidence-based mental health programs to reduce violence in schools.

Justice Breyer left an indelible mark on our country and our justice system through more than four decades of service—I am truly inspired by all the great work he has done. 

I thank him, and wish him the very best in his retirement.

Do you know someone in #PBC who has gone above and beyond to help others in our community? 

Help me give them the recognition they deserve. Nominate your outstanding neighbors below to be our next Local Hero: https://t.co/nWMxqD0VFv https://t.co/XjNKF0nesf

The 2022 filing season is officially open & will run through April 18. You have even more time to file this year, and there is help available—including here in #PBC! 

Don't wait until the last minute, start getting your necessary files together now. https://t.co/x3PqtJ7N94

Climate disasters cost us $145 billion just last year, yet Republicans are asking #SCOTUS to gut the #CleanAirAct, which has helped protect the health of Americans for over half a century. 

I'm proud to stand with Congressional Democrats to support clean air for all Americans. https://t.co/ZhcVnW48ZB

One year ago, @POTUS signed an Executive Order that ensured transgender Americans could again serve openly in the military.

All of our service members make our country stronger, including our transgender Americans in uniform. Thank you for your service #TransRightsAreHumanRights https://t.co/3V83WcZh2x

My Local Heroes program is back! I've been proud to recognize #PBC homeless advocates, educators, & health care workers that are making our community a better place, & I want to share more stories. Nominate a deserving friend, colleague, or loved one below:https://t.co/nWMxqD0VFv https://t.co/spX4A93c2a

The monthly #ChildTaxCredit was transformative for families across the country. We saw child poverty drastically reduced & money sent directly to parents who needed it. 

We must continue this lifeline. https://t.co/9jDbrEHT9c

Continuing the fight for equitable access to the ballot box is essential to safeguarding our democracy.

Watch our conversation now: https://t.co/TPwr5IWRfk

Today State Senator @TinaPolsky, @abskhir of the @ACLU, & Rich Bartholomew of the @LWVPBC joined me to discuss the importance of the work being done to protect everyone's voting rights—including current legislation in the Florida legislature & the U.S. Senate.

Only 12% of Florida kids between ages 5-11 are fully vaccinated, far behind the national rate. This is especially alarming as we see pediatric #COVID19 cases spike. 

Parents, the best way to protect your children is to vaccinate them as soon as possible. https://t.co/nmte6z1Z9r

Today is the anniversary of the ratification of the 24th Amendment, eliminating the poll tax and making access to the ballot box more equitable. 

58 years later, we are still fighting to protect the sacred right to vote, and we are dedicated to continuing the fight. https://t.co/qg7x5VnqJd

I was outside the #SCOTUS last year making our voices heard as the hearings over the Mississippi abortion ban began.

We can't just depend on our voices though, we need to defend the right of all people to determine their own reproductive destinies.

We need #WHPA now. https://t.co/N4T3QdsVAt

Some years later, the American people had a great victory for reproductive freedom with #RoeVWade.

Today we are commemorating the 49th anniversary of that historic decision, while also fighting to protect reproductive freedom from attacks all over the country. #Roe49

When I was just 15 years old, before #RoeVWade, I found a friend nearly bleeding to death from a botched illegal abortion. Fortunately she was saved, but I wish she had access to a safe, legal abortion then.

According to the @NIH, more than 90% of pregnant women report taking a medication during pregnancy, yet only 1% of clinical trials study the impact on pregnancies or lactation. 

We need to continue the efforts to identify & address the needs of pregnant & lactating women.

Today, I sent a bipartisan letter with @HerreraBeutler, @RepRoybalAllard & 60 of our colleagues urging @HHSGov to continue its work on studying how medications impact pregnant & lactating women. https://t.co/MrXZ9oJyw4

Thanks to the Biden Administration, insurance companies are now required to cover at-home #COVID19 tests. I joined this letter to @CMSGov because Medicare should too.

You can get free tests delivered to your house by ordering at https://t.co/wY0irwz41u or calling 1-800-232-0233. https://t.co/n7gGNcVVBs

U.S. blood banks are facing their worst blood shortage in more than a decade.

This National Volunteer Blood Donor Month, take the time to learn more about donation. Find out if you're eligible, read about the benefits, & find a site near you: https://t.co/bZ8V7MiMDs

Americans deserve to have infrastructure that works. Thanks to the Bipartisan Infrastructure Law, they will. 

Millions of jobs will be created to #BuildBackBetter roads, bridges, highways, rail, water infrastructure, transit, & more. https://t.co/o59loSWE9x

Thank you State Senator @loriberman, @mintimm President of @NARAL, & Sarah Bonner from @PPSENFL  for joining me today to honor the 49th Anniversary of #RoeVWade & discuss current attacks on reproductive freedom. #BansOffOurBodies

Watch our conversation: https://t.co/M3LIhrxnFk
Congratulations and good luck to all #PBC Teacher of the Year finalists! Thank you for all you do for our community's students and families. https://t.co/6YdtvXe9u7

It's inspiring to see the #PBC Jewish community step up to help others. Testing for #COVID19 if you experience symptoms or are exposed is one of the best ways to slow the spread.

Order tests free to your home at https://t.co/wY0irwz41u or find sites below:https://t.co/Ex9Wbh9MGs

This #SCOTUS ruling is a victory for the truth, rule of law, & American people. No one, not even the former president, is above the law. 

Transparency is essential to the Committee on the January 6th Attack's work to ensuring this never happens again. https://t.co/n7pybmdA4l

By automatically enrolling veterans in VA healthcare services, @RepMarkTakano's EVEST Act will help: 

• Meet veterans' mental health needs 
• Increase veterans' access to healthcare
